Package common

Class CommonMethods

java.lang.Object
common.CommonMethods
public class CommonMethods extends Object
this is a class that includes all the common methods that were used in different classes/controllers
Author:
Mahran, Shadi

    • switchScene

      public static Object switchScene(Class<?> c, javafx.stage.Stage stage, String newPageName, String cssFileName)
      Method to switch scenes/stages this method is used to move between pages this method implements the application decoration (App)
      Parameters:
      c - for the class type
      stage - for the current stage
      newPageName - for the new page name
      cssFileName - for the CSS name
      Returns:
      return the loader controller

    • switchScene

      public static Object switchScene(Class<?> c, String newPageName, String cssFileName, javafx.event.Event event)
      Method to switch scenes/stages this method is used to move between pages this method implements the application decoration (App) this message similar to the first Method but doesn't get the stage as a parameter it gets an event of switching and using it gets the stage Note: same as the first method but without CSS files
      Parameters:
      c - class
      newPageName - page name
      cssFileName - css name
      event - event on switching
      Returns:
      null

      event - event of switching stages

    • textLegality

      public static void textLegality(javafx.scene.control.TextField tFID, int limit)
      Static Method to check the TextField legality such as : the input are only numbers the input length is less or equals to limit parameter
      Parameters:
      tFID - the TextField
      limit - the length limit

    • convertToPdf

      public static void convertToPdf(String reportName, String path)
      Method to Convert from the stage/scene to pdf file with the report name the method takes a picture for the stage and resize it and implements it to the pdf file it also writes the name of the report with a message to the user at the top of the page
      Parameters:
      reportName - name of the report
      path - for the path

    • importantLabel

      public static void importantLabel(javafx.scene.control.Label important)

    • continueWithEnter

      public static void continueWithEnter(javafx.scene.control.TextField field, javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      A method that allows the user to press the enter key to trigger a button's action.
      Parameters:
      field - the TextField where the event listener will be added
      button - the button that will be triggered when the enter key is pressed
